clusters.title: Deadly Austin bar shooting investigated as possible terror attack
clusters.neutral_headline: Austin Bar Shooting Investigated As Terror Attack

items.title: Deadly Austin bar shooting investigated as possible terror attack
items.standfirst: The FBI is investigating a shooting that killed two people at an Austin, Texas, bar as a possible terror attack. Jason Allen reports.
items.content: The FBI is investigating a shooting that killed two people at an Austin, Texas, bar as a possible terror attack. Jason Allen reports.

items.title: Gunman kills two in Texas bar shooting, FBI probing ‘terrorism’ link
items.standfirst: Suspect fired from SUV, then got out of the vehicle and opened fire with a rifle before being killed by officers.
items.content: Suspect fired from SUV, then got out of the vehicle and opened fire with a rifle before being killed by officers.

items.title: Deadly Texas bar shooting 'potentially act of terrorism', FBI says
items.standfirst: Two people were killed and 14 injured, with the suspected gunman, identified by some media outlets, also shot dead.
items.content: Two people were killed and 14 injured, with the suspected gunman, identified by some media outlets, also shot dead.

ai_summary: Two people killed in Austin bar shooting
FBI investigating possible terror attack
Suspect fired from SUV and rifle
14 people injured in the shooting
Suspected gunman shot dead by officers

clusters.title: UK will allow US to use bases to strike Iranian missile sites, PM says
clusters.neutral_headline: UK Allows US To Use Bases For Defensive Strikes

items.title: UK will allow US to use bases to strike Iranian missile sites, PM says
items.standfirst: The prime minister says it remains the case that the UK will "not join offensive action now".
items.content: The prime minister says it remains the case that the UK will "not join offensive action now".

items.title: UK PM Starmer says US can use UK bases for ‘defensive strikes’ on Iran
items.standfirst: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer says he’s accepted a request from the US to let his country’s military bases be used.
items.content: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer says he’s accepted a request from the US to let his country’s military bases be used.

ai_summary: UK to allow US use of bases for strikes
Bases to be used for defensive strikes on Iran
UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer made announcement
UK will not join offensive action now
US can use UK bases for specific purposes

clusters.title: Amazon Cloud Disrupted After ‘Objects’ Hit UAE Data Center
clusters.neutral_headline: Amazon Cloud Services Disrupted By UAE Data Center Incident

items.title: Amazon Cloud Disrupted After ‘Objects’ Hit UAE Data Center
items.standfirst: Amazon Web Services Inc. suffered a disruption to its services after unidentified objects struck one of its data centers in the United Arab Emirates, causing a fire.
items.content: Amazon Web Services Inc. suffered a disruption to its services after unidentified objects struck one of its data centers in the United Arab Emirates, causing a fire.

items.title: Why was AWS Middle East disrupted? #tech
items.standfirst: Brief timeline and cause Amazon Web Services reported that one of its data centers in the United Arab Emirates was struck by objects, a development Reuters described as impacting the mec1‑az2 availability zone. The company said connectivity and service restoration would take several hours. The…
items.content: Brief timeline and cause Amazon Web Services reported that one of its data centers in the United Arab Emirates was struck by objects, a development Reuters described as impacting the mec1‑az2 availability zone. The company said connectivity and service restoration would take several hours. The…

ai_summary: Amazon data center in UAE struck by objects
Disruption caused by fire at data center
AWS services affected by the incident
Connectivity and services being restored
Incident impacted mec1-az2 availability zone

clusters.title: Allies of US in the Gulf bear brunt of Iran attacks
clusters.neutral_headline: Iran Attacks Target Gulf Arab States And Civilian Infrastructure

items.title: Allies of US in the Gulf bear brunt of Iran attacks
items.standfirst: Iran's attacks on Gulf Arab states suggest the Islamic Republic is targeting not just the US military but also civilian infrastructure.
items.content: Iran's attacks on Gulf Arab states suggest the Islamic Republic is targeting not just the US military but also civilian infrastructure.

items.title: Military briefing: Iran’s new retaliation strategy
items.standfirst: Islamic republic launches constant barrages at Israel while targeting civilian sites around the Gulf
items.content: Islamic republic launches constant barrages at Israel while targeting civilian sites around the Gulf
